A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Scroll down to '...'
4. See error

## Expected Behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior

What actually happened. Include screenshots if applicable.

- OS: [e.g., macOS, Windows, Linux]

- Version: [e.g., v1.0.0]
